name: Tree Meats Forest
description:
Climate Game Jam Entry

It's the the programmers and the artists first time. What a learning experence!

TUTORIAL

Press 'Space' to move up or down.

Protect 3 Endangered Species to win.

Endangered Species look like a cat! Protect endangered species by pressing 'W'.

 Fail to block an enemy and you lose. Enemies are: 

Climate Change, it looks like a wave!   Adapt to climate change by pressing 'A' to block.

Climate Denier, it looks like a screaming person! Engage with climate deniers by pressing 'D' to block.
